title: Everything’s About to Change: You’ll Be Shocked by What the Bankers Have Planned—Insider Tells All

By Lisa Haven
Total:

Tuesday, October 3, 2017 10:23
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
 
So many things are heating up around the world and time is running out for people to prepare and ready themselves for what’s ahead. Financial analysts are asking if this year will be the year the economy finally crashes or if it will hold out for another year.
To be frank, foreign governments are already dumping US debt at record rates and the Baltic Dry Index and Stock Markets are going bonkers. With this in mind, I thought it best to offer a solution to the depressing economy and interview economic strategist and stock trading specialist, Bob Kudla, owner of Trade Genius , a professional stock trading website.
I HIGHLY encourage you to watch the video below in its entirety as it contains vital information about what might just save you when the economic crisis comes crashing down. Everything from Cryptocurrency to Bitcoin is discussed…

First off Trump needs to declare America debt free because of the criminal actions of the elite bankers ! They created a system that can not be paid off ! A nation borrows the money , they print the money . But they do not print the interest to pay off the loan interest . So the nation has 2 choices . Either they sell off their goods ( Gold , silver , oil or whatever the lite values  ) or they borrow more money hoping to catch up . Most nations follow this path . So over and over they borrow and more and more interest is built up . Then they compound the interest . Like America we owe $20,000,000,000,000  . We don’t have this money . O nut case sold off much of our goods giving them to the  elite all for pieces of paper with pictures of dead presidents on them . The elite set up a system we could not pay back . Even if we sold off all our goods they would still want our country . This is their plans anyway . Our Constitution plainly told us to stick with our Gold and Silver coins system . Why ? Because the value is in the coin to pay for the goods or labor it is being spent on . A one ounce stamped coin today is selling  for $1361.25  The elite stole our gold and silver coins and melted them into bars for easy transport out of America . Should the elite refuse Trumps declaration or crimes against humanityand refuse to set America free  , then bomb the hell out of them , then go get our stolen gold and silver bars ! Problem solved ! America debt free and our gold and silver back in Fort  Knox , then  use their paper money to start fires with or play monopoly .
